name: Zero to Hero
description:
Embark on a journey from Zero to Hero in this exciting and challenging turn-based tactics game. Set in a 1960s game show, you'll be armed with powerful superpowers, facing a series of obstacles and overcoming challenges along the way. Emerge victorious and keep your powers for good.

Each game offers new strategies to explore, with a vast array of upgrades to choose from. Take a chance by engaging in battles without upgrading, or play it safe and upgrade to increase your chances of survival. Make the most of one-time use potions to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Create your own legend by generating comic books that capture your heroic exploits. Take your skills to the next level with incredible mutations that offer new ways to play.

Step up to the challenge and become the hero you were meant to be in Zero to Hero, the turn-based tactics game with infinite replayability.





Each run, your character will gain different superpowers. Test your skills and challenge yourself to win with each power, or go for an even bigger challenge and try to win with all combinations. With over 100 combinations to discover, the possibilities are endless. The powers work differently, and your strategy will depend on the strengths and weaknesses of your two selected skills. Make clever use of mutations to modify your powers and enhance your abilities.



Embark on a journey of endless possibilities with the unpredictable mutations in Zero to Hero. Transform your powers and abilities by unlocking new and diverse mutations that can drastically alter or enhance your existing powers. With each new run, the mutations available to you will be different, forcing you to adapt, improvise and make the most of the mutations you receive. Experience a game unlike any other, where every run is a unique and thrilling adventure. Get ready to face the unknown and become the hero you were meant to be.



Beware of the game show hosts, who will stop at nothing to prevent you from becoming a hero. Each host has a unique arena with custom mechanics, and you'll need to improvise and adapt to overcome their challenges. Whether you're on the defensive or pushing your advantage, the excitement never ends in Zero to Hero.
